title: Top Five Denzel Washington Movies and ‘The Little Things'
description:
With the release of ‘The Little Things' on HBO Max, Denzel Washington's first starring role in almost three years, it's time to celebrate one of the world's greatest living actors. Joining Sean and Amanda is Ringer staff writer and Denzel superfan Shea Serrano to break down his remarkable career and share their top five Washington performances.

Hosts: Sean Fennessey and Amanda Dobbins
Guest: Shea Serrano
